name: reversible knot mesh top
notes:
the knot mesh top is a reversible mesh top, perfect for those sunny days or a night out with friends! the best part is, it's beginner-friendly and works up quickly, making it an ideal project for those new to crochet or anyone looking for a relaxing yet rewarding design. 

the top has a unique reversible design, giving you the flexibility to switch up your look. you'll love the texture, the breathability, and how comfortable it feels to wear!
i'm totally obsessed with it and it has become my go-to outfit whenever i'm at craft fairs and festivals as a vendor. :)

if you're a visual learner, you'll find an in-depth [video tutorial][1] on my youtube channel. it complements the written instructions and demonstrates each stitch and technique used in the pattern.

the pattern includes useful guidelines and stitch count suggestions to guarantee an ideal fit, yet it can also be customized to your specific measurements, allowing you to adjust the length and width according to your preferences. i designed it to be suitable for everyone, no matter what size, gender, and body shape  however, it is true that each body is different, and there may be variations in how the pattern fits from person to person.

skill level: beginner

supplies needed:
- hook 5 mm (or corresponding hook to meet the gauge swatch)
- between 150 and 500 yards of #4 medium weight yarn - for size s, i’ve used 2 skeins (100 gr/3.5 oz/210 m/230 yards) of hobbii friends 8/6 from hobbii in colourway 124 (black) and 14 (caramel)

for suitable yarn substitution, click [here][2]

- scissors
- tape measure
- yarn needle
- stitch markers

the pattern has pictures to clarify the written instructions.

****this design has been tested by people with different bodies and bra cups: from size s to size xxl****
